usage.basic: Use these examples as templates for your own Shape Up cycles
usage.modify: Copy and modify the JSON files to match your project needs
usage.run: Pass the JSON file contents as inputs to the Shape Up process
usage.phases: Examples show full-cycle, shaping-only, and building-only patterns

cycleStructure.week1: Get oriented, map scopes, begin uphill work
cycleStructure.week2-3: Move scopes uphill toward top of hill
cycleStructure.week4: Scopes should be reaching top or moving downhill
cycleStructure.week5: Most scopes downhill, building known solutions
cycleStructure.week6: Finish work, QA integration, circuit breaker decision

tips: Set appetite first, then shape solution to fit
Call out rabbit holes explicitly during shaping
Define no-gos clearly to prevent scope creep
Map scopes as integrated slices, not technical layers
Update hill charts honestly - don't hide stuck work
Integrate QA throughout cycle, not just at end
Respect the circuit breaker - no automatic extensions
Use cool-down for rest and exploration, not structured work
